Breathwork - Free Weekly Class • Basel
description: Free Breathwork Session You are invited every Wednesday to experience the great benefits of the Joy of Breathing technique. Learn how to breathe naturally and fully with this simple and effective method. Start your journey to greater health, vitality, peace and joy! I Tried Wim Hof Breathing, Holotropic Breathwork and many others, but... I didn't feel complete. After 30+ years of working as a Breathwork instructor, I finally found the right mix of breathing exercise, energy work and meditation to get fantastic results with a short daily practice! Every Wednesday 30min Class REGISTER FOR FREE ACCESS CLASS REPLAY NEXT BREATHING EVENT Guided Breathing Exercise and Meditation Connect with your highest intentions and deepest desires, from vibrant health, energy, peace, joy, love , to whatever you want to manifest in your life. Learn to access deep meditative states of consciousness and influence your well-being from an expanded self-awareness. Experience the Joy of Breathing Technique "That was truly incredible. Thank you!" - Sophie "It was my first time and I’m in pure joy and peace." - Aysen “My first time, incredible, I’ve never felt that before thank you so much.” – Rachael "I feel so much better. Thank you Sylvie 🙂🙏" - Ania "What an experience, I felt I was being cleaned." - Peter "You have made an incredible impact on my daily life, Sylvie, esp. with managing lower back and MS pain. Great for alleviating depression!" - Rachel "I really love the Joy of Breathing both as a practice and for life." - Dekya "That session took me deep into my soul. Very healing on all levels: body, mind, spirit, feelings...everything!"  - Bradley "Thanks a lot for that session, every week it feels better and better 🙂" - Stephanie "Thank you! I see improvements in just a few weeks of doing this." - Kai Class Program Learn the Joy of Breathing technique Practice deep breathwork and energy meditation Experience a profound relaxation Questions, answers & sharing Enjoy the benefits Attending Zoom Meeting Connect on Zoom 10 minutes prior to class start time and silence cell phones Wear comfortable clothing Refrain from eating 1.5 to 2 hours before practice Yoga mat and a blanket might help you feel comfortable CLASS INSTRUCTIONS Help Recover From Covid Though we do not make claims that anyone will be healed from Covid with the Joy of Breathing technique, many participants regularly share that a consistent practice of the breathing technique has helped them to recover more quickly from Covid. Benefits of Breathwork Several scientific studies have demonstrated the great benefits of breathwork: Increase inner joy Relax the body and mind Reduce the stress response Balance the nervous system Reduce anxiety Decrease inflammation Improve mental clarity Strengthen the immune system Increase longevity Improve sleep quality And much more... Sylvie Horvath #breathwork #yoga #pranayama I have been guiding spiritual seekers for over 30 years with the self-transformative teachings of yoga, pranayama, transformational breathwork and meditation. During the last decades, I have been continuously updating my understanding of pranayama with the latest discoveries in sciences and contemporary breathwork techniques such as Wim Hof Breathing, Holotropic Breathwork and Transformational Breathwork. It is my pleasure and honor to guide you toward self-empowerment, transformation, and awakened consciousness. I will help you connect to your deepest self and inner guide, from the physical to the soul dimension. BIOGRAPHY About Soul Dimension SOULDIMENSION.ORG

title: Breathwork Healing Session • Joy of Breathing • Köniz
description: Get your ticket and receive a bonus! Purchase a ticket to our live events and enjoy a 7-day bonus access. Dive into Healing Sessions, Masterclasses, Breathing Experiences, and Live Breathing Classes immediately. Learn more. Experience the amazing healing power of your breath with the Joy of Breathing technique. It allows you to quickly and effectively access a deeper connection with your body, mind, heart and soul. During this 75 minute online live session you will be safely and gently guided to explore, feel and connect to deeper layers of your body, emotions and consciousness. You will journey into profoundly healing, deeply relaxing and transformative states of being . "These sessions are perfect for anyone who wants to experience higher states of well-being, consciousness and self-healing." Joy of Breathing Technique For over 30 years , Sylvie has been experiencing, learning, practicing and teaching a wide scope of breathwork and pranayama techniques. She finally developed her own technique that is both a science and yoga-based practice. It weaves together modern scientific discoveries in breathwork and the ancient yogic wisdom . "The technique is simple and powerful enough that anyone can practice and get benefits during the first session." Testimonials "Brilliant! I feel wonderful!" - Aidian "Think I have just experienced my first third eye actual awareness." - Robert "That session took me deep into my soul. Very healing on all levels: body, mind, spirit, feelings... everything!" - Bradley "I felt like I was levitating at one point. I feel healthier right now. Can’t wait to do this again." - Nancy "My hands were vibrating a lot and then I started hearing noise, almost that sound when your ears are ringing. Feel great now, very relaxed!" - Kathy "I feel so grateful to have found this. You bring beautiful energy and teach this practice so well. Thank you so very much!" - Tara "It is my pleasure to guide you toward self-empowerment and self-awakening. You will be guided to experience your truest self, from the physical to the soul dimension." Sylvie Horvath #breathwork #pranayama #yoga BIOGRAPHY Sylvie is the creator of the Joy of Breathing. She's been guiding spiritual seekers for over 30 years with the self-transformative teachings of yoga, pranayama, breathwork and meditation. Event Information Agenda Introduction & instructions Deep breathing session Healing meditation Relaxation Sharing & questions and answers Attending Event Connect on Zoom 10 minutes prior to class start time and silence cell phones Wear comfortable clothing Refrain from eating 1.5 to 2 hours before practice Yoga mat and a blanket might help you feel comfortable SOULDIMENSION.ORG Copyright © 2022 • Soul Dimension

title: Marieke Breugem @EHL "Surf with your cycle": Informal conference on hormones and the cycle
location: Sport Center, EHL Hospitality Business School, Route de Berne 301, 1000 Lausanne 25, Switzerland
description: Marieke Breugem @EHL "Surf with your cycle": Informal conference on hormones and the cycle Come join us at the Sport Center, EHL Hospitality Business School for an exciting event with Marieke Breugem! Women are physically and mentally influenced by monthly hormonal cycles. Understanding the cycle and how it works can help to find the right strategies in order to feel well and energised at every moment. Dive into the world of hormones and the cycle in a relaxed and informal setting. • Understanding my body, my hormones and my cycles. • My strategies for taking care of myself. • Some troubleshooting. Date: 31st of October Time: 12:15-13:15 Location: Studio 2, Sport Center, EHL Hospitality Business School, Route de Berne 301, 1000 Lausanne 25, Switzerland

title: Vital Breath - Breathwork for Men
description: Unser Atem ist ein super mächtiges und zugleich natürliches Tool, das wir alle in uns tragen. Die simple, aber sehr kraftvolle Technik ermöglicht es, in unterbewusste und bewusstseinsverändernde Zustände zu gelangen. Schließe deine Augen, richte deine Aufmerksamkeit auf deinen Atem - Fülle den Bauch, die Brust und lass den Atem wieder fallen. Komme in einen kontinuierlichen Fluss, ganz in deinem Rhythmus und verbinde dich mit dir selbst - So beginnt die Reise beim Conscious Connected Breathing. Eine tiefgehende Atemreise und eine gesunde Männerrunde - Dies erwartet Dich beim Breathwork von Vital Breath. Wir öffnen einen Raum, in dem Du in Verbindung mit deinem Körper kommst und ganz Du selbst sein kannst. In unserem Alltag, wo wir immer von einem zum anderen springen, unseren Gedanken kaum Ruhe gönnen und immer mehr Leistung von uns erwartet wird, ist es wichtig, immer wieder zu sich zu kommen, nach Innen zu spüren und in Verbindung zu kommen. Angeleitet durch Patrick und Paul, lässt Du dich in die meditative Session begleiten. Die Technik ermöglicht es, tiefe persönliche Ebenen an Emotionen, alten Geschichten, psychische oder energetische Blockaden wahrzunehmen und aufzuarbeiten. Üblich sind auch tiefe Zustände der Entspannung sowie der Wahrnehmungsverzerrung von Raum und Zeit. Aber keine Sorge, es kommen alle wieder zurück. Durch die Erfahrung in der Männerarbeit wissen wir, was für eine inspirierende und transformative Energie im Kreis von Männern aufkommen kann. Dies im Verbund mit der Atemarbeit gibt uns Männer noch einmal neue Möglichkeiten für Prozessarbeit und uns besser und anders kennenzulernen. Wir arbeiten nach der Naikando Methode - Vibrationen verschiedener Art benutzen wir als Tools, um die Session zu leiten. Musik bildet die Grundlage und gibt Dir einen Rhythmus vor. Mit Stimmgabel, verschiedenen Klanginstrumenten und der Stimme können wir spezifisch Impulse geben und jeden individuell in seinem Prozess begleiten und unterstützen. Essenzielle Infos: Du brauchst keine Vorerfahrung, um an der Session teilzunehmen. Trage bequeme Kleidung, in der du dich wohl fühlst Vermeide schwere Kost zwei Stunden vor dem Breathwork Lies dir bitte die kontraindikationen auf unserer Webseite durch Mehr Infos unter: maennerkreis-jedermann.ch/breathwork Wir freuen uns auf Dich bei Vital Breath im Be:Life

title: NECTAR  #me-story workshop
description: Die Geschichte, die du dir tagtäglich über dich selber erzählst, sie bestimmt, wer du bist, wie du fühlst, wie du handelst. In unserem Workshop wirst du diese Geschichte noch besser kennenlernen. Und wirst anfangen, sie zum kraftvollen Instrument deines Aufbruchs zu machen. Wir freuen uns auf Dich! Resultate: - Du erlebst die Gestaltbarkeit deiner Me-Story - Du gewinnst Klarheit zu deinem Auftrag und Zielen - Du schaffst dir selber ein Instrument, das dich ins Handeln bringen und leiten wird Daten: Samstag, 26. Oktober 2024, 12 bis 15 Uhr, Zürich Samstag, 9. November 2024, 12 bis 15 Uhr, Bern Samstag, 23. November 2024, 12 bis 15 Uhr, Zürich Kosten: CHF 450.- p.P., inkl. Material

title: Zurich Aiducation Impact Dinner 2024
description: REGISTER HERE: https://gyla.net/events/131023 We believe that education is the most important lever for the development of people. People shape societies and are therefore the most important lever for the economic, politcal and social development of any country. Together with our donors, we award merit-based high school scholarships to bright and needy students in developing countries who don't have access to high school education! Thereby, our donors turn a talented and poor child into a talented and empowered citizen. This dinner is being organised to raise funds for Aiducation and as such, a minimum contribution for attendance is CHF 125.- per person (receipt issued is valid for charity tax reduction). We hope that many of you will join us to create impact and memories with us. www.aiducation.org

title: Award Ceremony Swiss Sustainability Challenge 2024
description: Award Ceremony Swiss Sustainability Challenge 2024 Es ist wieder so weit - die Gewinnprojekte der Swiss Sustainability Challenge 2024 werden mit dem Pax Sustainability Award ausgezeichnet. Wir laden Sie herzlich zur Preisverleihung mit anschliessendem Apero ein, um ein weiteres erfolgreiches Jahr mit vielen spannenden und wirkungsvollen Projekten zu feiern. Lernen Sie die Finalist*innen und ihre Projekte vor Ort kennen und seien Sie dabei, wenn die Gewinner*innen bekannt gegeben werden! Die Preisverleihung findet am 23. Oktober 2024 um 17.30 Uhr im Markthalle in Basel statt. Die Gäste werden gebeten, sich bis zum 14. Oktober anzumelden. --- It's that time again - the winning projects of the Swiss Sustainability Challenge 2024 will be awarded with the Pax Sustainability Award. We cordially invite you to the award ceremony followed by an apero to celebrate another successful year with many exciting and impactful projects. Meet the finalists and their projects on site and be there when the winners are announced! The award ceremony will take place on October 23, 2024 at 17:30 pm at the Markthalle in Basel. Guests are kindly requested to register by October 14. **(EN) Please note that by registering and participating in this event, you agree to the recording of your appearance and/or your voice, which the Swiss Sustainability Challenge and Pax can publish in photos, videos and accompanying sound recordings via online and offline media, and for marketing purposes. (DE) Bitte beachte, dass Sie mit der Anmeldung und Teilnahme an dieser Veranstaltung der Aufzeichnung Ihres Auftritts und/oder Ihrer Stimme zustimmen, die Swiss Sustainability Challenge und Pax in Form von Fotos, Videos und begleitenden Tonaufnahmen über Online- und Offline-Medien sowie zu Marketingzwecken veröffentlichen können.

title: Fundraising from America
description: Did you know that charitable giving in the U.S. reached an impressive US$557 billion in 2023?(Giving USA 2024). Yes, you read that right. Out of this, a substantial US$36 billion came from Corporations, US$103 billion from Foundations and a whopping US$374 billion from individual donors with the remainder from bequests. With over half of Americans actively participating in charitable giving, the reasons behind their generosity are as multifaceted as the donors themselves.Be it alumni upholding devotion to their alma mater, a US Foundation fostering innovation with exciting programs, or major donors with Swiss ancestry or interests, the diversity of American donors is as vast as the organisations they support. With our 27 years of experience in the American market, we possess an intimate understanding of its nuances and want to leverage this knowledge for your benefit to help you tap into this multi billion dollar funding pool. We would like to invite you to our in-person, one-day, practical and targeted workshop, "Fundraising from America." This exclusive event, scheduled for 29th October 2024 at the Centre International de Conférences Geneve (CICG)in Geneva, has been meticulously curated to give you practical information about tax and legal issues, fundraising information and the information you need to know to maximise your potential in the American market. Led by international experts Nancy Bikson (International tax lawyer),Lior Renous and Arnaud Marcilhacy (French fundraiser) you will benefit from over 50 years collective experience in global giving. Morning session - we will focus on American fundraising generally including the legal and tax issues you need to know and how to address them and will look at the issues relating to fundraising from Major Donors and Companies . We will discuss prospect research, wealth screening and relationship mapping as well as building a US-orientated Case for Support and Action Plan. And we will talk about how to cultivate and steward donors without being physically present in the US all the time. Afternoon session - we will demystify Fundraising from Foundations . Learn to navigate the labyrinth of foundation funding, from identifying funders and opportunities that align with your mission to engagement strategies for optimising your success. We offer tools and knowledge to craft compelling grant applications that captivate decision-makers and secure essential funding. Invest in your fundraising journey in America by booking your ticket now for just 150 CHF, or opt for our flexible half-day offer at 100 CHF. There is a 10% earlybird discount for all tickets booked before 23rd September with the code earlybird10.

title: Célébrer l’Art et les Droits des Minorités
location: Centre des arts - Ecole Internationale de Genève
description: [The event will be held in French, with simultaneous translation into English available]. La soirée du 6 novembre 2024 célébrera le pouvoir de l’art pour faire avancer la réalisation des droits humains. D’une part, cet événement marquera le lancement de l’exposition collective intitulée « Arts, Minorités et Droits Humains », mettant à l’honneur une sélection d’œuvres de 22 artistes et lauréat.e.s du Concours international d’art pour les artistes issu.e.s de minorités. Le concours est organisé depuis 2022 par le Haut-Commissariat des Nations Unies aux Droits de l’Homme (HCDH) et ses partenaires, les ONG Freemuse et Minority Rights Group International (MRG), et la Ville de Genève. Organisée en collaboration avec le Centre des Arts de l’École Internationale de Genève, cette exposition retrace les parcours, l’engagement et le travail artistique des lauréat.e.s des éditions 2022, 2023 et 2024 de ce concours, et fait la lumière sur les thématiques de l’apatridie, de l’intersectionnalité, et de la mémoire dans le présent. D’autre part, la soirée du 6 novembre fait partie des célébrations du Centenaire d’Ecolint et de la Déclaration de Genève sur les droits de l'enfant (1924), soulignant ainsi l’importance de l’art et de l’éducation pour la réalisation des droits humains à travers le monde. Programme : 18h-19h : Cocktail de bienvenue et visites de l’exposition en plusieurs langues, y compris par certain.e.s artistes dont les œuvres sont exposé.e.s (français, anglais, espagnol, portugais, allemand, à confirmer) 19h-20h : Événement d’ouverture de l’exposition et célébrations musicales : > Plusieurs allocutions, dont  Monsieur le Directeur général de l’Ecole Internationale, Conrad Hughes ; Madame la Maire de la Ville de Genève, Christina Kitsos ; Monsieur le Rapporteur spécial des Nations Unies sur les questions relatives aux minorités, le Professeur Nicolas Levrat ; > Présentation par une artiste lauréate du Concours international pour les artistes issu.e.s de minorités ; > Performance musicale du Club de Musique des Nations Unies à Genève. L'événement aura lieu en français, avec une traduction en anglais disponible.

title: The Cool Brigade
description: Welcome to the Cool Brigade, the coldesst but coolest community in town! Every Sunday, we gather for an invigorating ice bath followed by a delicious lunch . Our routine is simple: dip into icy waters to refresh your body, then warm up with good food and great company. At the Cool Brigade, we believe in the power of cold water to boost vitality and the magic of socializing to strengthen bonds. Whether you're here to revive your senses, make new friends, or just enjoy a unique Sunday experience, you'll find a welcoming and lively group ready to share in the fun . Join us for a refreshing start to your week—dip, dine, and delight in the company of fellow cold-seekers. Embrace the freeze and feel the connection! The Cool Brigade

title: Clément Leroy @EHL "Finding balance through imbalance"
description: The Balance Challenge: Discover the World of Trackstand with Clément Leroy Are you ready to discover the world of balance and endurance? Join us for an inspiring event with Clément Leroy, 6-time Trackstand World Champion! 🗓️ When? Wednesday, October 30, 2024 🕐 Time? From 6:15 PM to 7:00 PM 🏢 Where? Tschumi, EHL Lausanne Whether you're a cycling enthusiast or simply curious about pushing your limits, this event is tailored for everyone interested in the art of balance and personal achievement. ✨ Meet Clément Leroy: Hear his story of perseverance and dedication that led him to become a Trackstand World Champion. 🚴‍♂️ Trackstand Demonstration: Witness Clément showcase his extraordinary skills in a live demonstration. 🧠 Tips on Balance & Focus: Gain hands-on tips and exercises on improving balance and concentration, directly from the world champion himself. 🎤 Q&A Session: Ask Clément anything about his journey, cycling tips, or how to conquer mental challenges. Did you know? The current trackstand world record, set by Clément Leroy, is over 8 hours of maintaining balance without putting a foot down. Imagine standing still for an entire workday without moving an inch! Don't miss this opportunity to meet a world-class athlete, learn about the importance of mental and physical balance, and take home some practical lessons for everyday life! This in-person conference will take place at EHL Hospitality Business School . Reserve your spot now!

title: Healing Breathwork | Accelerate emotional and physical healing • Neuchâtel
description: Get your ticket and receive a bonus! Purchase a ticket to our live events and enjoy a 7-day bonus access. Dive into Healing Sessions, Masterclasses, Breathing Experiences, and Live Breathing Classes immediately. Learn more. Powerful Healing Breathwork Session The Healing Breathwork is a 75-minute online session of Soul Dimension Breathing, focused on addressing healing needs. With a deep focus on healing breathwork techniques, these sessions offer a powerful tool for healing and transformation at physical and emotional levels. You will learn how to use your breath to release emotional blocks, and accelerate the physical and emotional healing processes, and receive guidance to address your unique healing needs. Begin your journey through healing breathwork As your week starts enjoy the opportunity to begin your healing breathwork journey with Soul Dimension Breathing Technique. During the Healing Breathwork session, you will be safely and gently guided to explore, feel and connect to deeper layers of your body, emotions, and consciousness that will allow you to quickly and effectively access a profound connection with your body, mind, heart, and Soul unlocking all levels of self-healing. Meet your Guide, Sylvie Horvath Sylvie has been guiding spiritual seekers for over 30 years with the self-transformative teachings of yoga, pranayama, healing breathwork, and meditation. "It is my pleasure and honor to guide you toward self-empowerment, transformation, and awakened consciousness. I will help you connect to your deepest self and inner guide with breathwork from the physical to the soul dimension. Sylvie What is Soul Dimension Breathing Technique The Soul Dimension Breathing is a unique technique that combines the ancient knowledge of yoga pranayama, chakras, energy, sound healing, and modern science-backed information about the powerful benefits of breathwork. Testimonials "It was an amazing experience. Sylvie holds a beautiful and light space that allowed me to relax into healing and transformation. I had a very powerful experience that led me to explore exactly where my blocks are plus a new practice I can use to help on my healing breathwork journey. I'm grateful for her and the experience. Teresa Hallman Edgar, CA Everyone should take Sylvie’s classes. Her class today helped me release some pent-up regular emotions and made me feel like I have healed a little more. I’m I’ll be attending her breathwork classes on a regular basis. I think everyone should. Ashley Hurley, US This practice is so powerful in its healing and informative experience of the breath. Ryan Thornton, US This is a powerful meditation and breathwork session for healing and experiencing more peace, joy, and bliss. Steve Hutchinson, US Attending the Healing Breathwork Session Connect on Zoom 10 minutes before Healing Breathwork Session start time and silence cell phones Wear comfortable clothing Refrain from eating 1.5 to 2 hours before practice A yoga mat and a blanket might help you feel comfortable Conditions The Healing Breathwork session is conducted online using the Zoom Meetings application, so be sure to have a reliable internet connection. You will receive the login instructions in the order confirmation email just after the purchase. All classes are taught in English. Cancellation and refund policy There are no refunds for the ticket. If you are not able to join live, no worries! The replay will be available 24 hours after the end of the class and you will be able to access it until the end of your access period. By buying the ticket you will have access to our content (ticket and bonuses) for 7 days and the access period starts on the day of your purchase.

title: Somatic Movement Workshop: Building Bridges of Emotional Connection
description: Join this immersive experience designed to deepen your connection to yourself, others, and the world. Today, meaningful connection is more important than ever. Research consistently shows that the quality of our relationships is the most significant factor in our overall happiness and health. Yet, many of us feel that our connections aren’t as deep or authentic as we’d like them to be. This workshop offers a unique opportunity to discover the science and practice of authentic connection through a blend of somatic movement, Emotional Intelligence, and creative expression. This day-long workshop integrates **Azul Conscious Dance**, somatic and reflective practices to help you connect more deeply with yourself and others. Y ou’ll learn to sense, on a visceral level, what true connection feels like and how to create it in the moment. Why Connection Matters: Connection isn’t just a nice-to-have; it’s a fundamental human need. Here’s what research tells us: 1. Vital for Health and Longevity: Studies from the Harvard Study of Adult Development show that strong relationships are the most significant predictor of long-term health and happiness. 2. Reduces Stress and Enhances Resilience: Research indicates that close connections can lower stress levels and help us cope with life’s challenges more effectively. 3. Supports Emotional Well-being:** Our connections shape our sense of self-worth, belonging, and emotional stability. 4. Enhances Cognitive Function: Engaging in meaningful relationships has been shown to improve brain function and reduce cognitive decline as we age. 5. Fosters Personal Growth: Authentic connections provide a safe space for vulnerability, growth, and self-discovery. What You Will Experience: - Morning Session: - Opening Circle: Set intentions and create a welcoming space for exploration. - Azul Conscious Dance: Engage in mindful movement that deepens self-awareness, presence and self-intimacy. - Insights on Connection: Discover how your nervous system influences your ability to connect, with references to polyvagal theory and attachment styles. - Reflective Practices: Drawing and journaling to help integrate your experiences. - Lunch Break: A chance to pause, connect, and reflect. - Afternoon Session: - Partner Exercises: Simple practices that emphasize trust, empathy, and authentic communication. - Group Movement: Explore the dynamics of connection within a community, understanding how we relate in collective settings. - Emotional Intelligence Tools: Gain insights into how to navigate emotions and enhance communication. - Creative Reflection: Further integrate the day’s learnings through creative expression and sharing. - Integration and Closing Circle: Reflect on your experiences and insights. Throughout the day, participants will explore how the way we move reflects the way we live, using the body as a guide to uncover deeper truths and foster a sense of unity and belonging. This journey provides a safe space for being yourself and expressing your true nature, where all interactions and connections are facilitated within a guided framework and with full consent. The practices are designed to delve deeply into subconscious layers , allowing participants to identify and reflect on images, thoughts, beliefs, fears, and emotions. Participants will sense through the nervous system and body, gaining clarity on what deeper connection feels like. What You’ll Gain: This workshop offers an experience grounded in both research and embodied practice. You’ll leave with: - A Deep Sense of Connection: Experience the feeling of true connection in your body through movement and presence. - Practical Insights : Learn simple, effective practices to enhance your emotional intelligence and communication skills. - Greater Self-Awareness : Explore how your body and emotions interact, helping you navigate relationships with more clarity and confidence. - Joy, Fun, Creativity and Flow : Enjoy a day filled with joy, positive connections, creative expression, a sense of flow and discovery. "The way we move is the way we live, and through mindful movement, we can rediscover our authentic selves." — Thomas Hanna "Movement connects us to the present moment, to ourselves, and to the world around us, fostering a sense of unity and belonging." — Bonnie Bainbridge Cohen "Through somatic awareness, we can decode the messages of our nervous system and re-pattern our connections to self and others." — Dr. Pat Ogden Join us on a journey towards greater self-awareness, connection, and joy! What to bring/wear: - Wear comfortable clothing suitable for movement. You can dance in non-slippery socks or barefoot. - Please avoid or minimize perfume use, as strong scents can be distracting or uncomfortable for some participants. - Bring water to stay hydrated. - You can bring your art (drawing/painting/sculpting) supplies, if you want. Basic materials will be provided. ******************************* What is Azul conscious dance? Azul conscious dance is a practice of deep listening and authentic movement. It's not about performing or looking good; it's about tuning into your body's natural rhythms and expressions. Whether you find yourself moving freely or engaging in subtle, internal movements, this practice is all about embracing what feels true for you in the moment. It’s an exploration that is freeing, fun, and deeply relaxing, allowing you to reconnect with your authentic self. ******************************* No prior dance experience required. Everyone is welcome to go on this journey. ******************************* Date/time: October 27, 2024, 10:00 am - 5:00 pm (CET) Important: We start at 10 am sharp, and aim to finish at 1 pm. We always start on time. Come 15-20 mins earlier. Location: Volkshaus, Gelber Saal, Stauffacherstrasse 60, 8004 Zürich Price: 145 CHF. Language: English. *************************************** Registration, payment: https://The-Humans.ch ******************************* About Your Facilitator: Dr. Ekaterina Kamenskaya is a coach, mentor, and somatic movement facilitator with a background in engineering and emotional intelligence. With 17 years of experience in the tech industry, including a 13.5-year tenure at Google, she brings a unique blend of scientific insight and holistic practice to her workshops. Ekaterina has a rich and diverse background and experience: - A PhD in Engineering and a scientific book publication - A 17-year engineering career, including 13.5 years at Google - Taught various courses to Google employees, such as Life Design, mindfulness, emotional intelligence based on neuroscience, The Power of Human connection, etc. - Led D&I and educational communities, gave talks at the various conferences, organized hundreds of events - Studied and practiced somatics, body psychotherapy, relationship and sexuality coaching, and conscious dance - Offered mentorship and coaching - Led multiple conscious dance workshops in Zurich since 2022 Subscribe to receive news: https://The-Humans.ch Join Telegram group: https://t.me/+LmWh6d7S21k1ZGJi

title: International Conference on Traditional and Alternative Medicine
description: It is our utmost delight and excitement to invite you for the 2nd International Conference on Traditional and Alternative Medicine , to be held in the charming city of Zurich, Switzerland on June 16-17, 2025. The second conference this year will be focused on the theme of “ Alchemy of Healing: Unveiling the Secrets of Traditional and Alternative Medicine ,” and is sure to be a historical adventure of both the traditional and alternate modes of healing in a more serious understanding.

title: Conscious Breathwork for Emotional Release mit Dan Hart in Zürich Seefeld
description: Der RESET Conscious Breathwork-Abend mit Dan Hart ist eine dynamische Trance-Atemmeditation, durch die sich persönliche und kollektive Veränderungs- und Transformationsprozesse in Gang setzen oder beschleunigen lassen. Über bewusstes, fokussiertes Atmen wird das eigene Energiefeld so weit aufgebaut, dass sich ein erweiterter, transzendentaler Bewusstseinszustand erreichen lässt. In diesem Zustand können sowohl eigene Potenziale erkannt als auch unterdrückte Erlebnisse, Gefühle und Emotionen bewusst gemacht und zusammen mit den zugehörigen Programmen integriert oder aufgelöst werden. Am Freitag den 15.11.2024 Einlass ab 19:30 Uhr, Beginn um 19:45 Uhr. Nach Beginn der Veranstaltung ist kein Einlass mehr möglich. Dauer der Atem-Session ca. 80 min. VVOO YOGA STUDIO, Dufourstrasse 90, oberhalb Monocle, 8008 Zürich Seefeld Mehr Infos: Der RESET Conscious Breathwork-Abend ist ein seit vielen Jahren etabliertes Atemtherapie-Format, bei dem sich intensive Trance-Atmung mit moderner Energiemedizin, sensibler Körperarbeit und Geistigem Heilen verbindet. Das Balancieren von Geist, Seele und Körper fördert die Selbstheilungskräfte und unterstützt bei der Wiederentdeckung der eignen Fähigkeiten und Möglichkeiten. Durch die geführte Atem-Meditation, die aufmerksame Begleitung des erfahrenen Teams und das Kohärenz Feld der gemeinsam atmenden Gruppe entsteht ein sicherer Raum, der Dir die Möglichkeit gibt Dich und Deine Themen zu explorieren. Die Begleiter des RESET Conscious Breathwork-Abends sind ausgebildete Therapeuten, die während der Atmungen für Dich da sind, für einen geschützten Raum sorgen und sowohl in der Atmung, als auch darüber hinaus für Integrationsarbeit und Nachbereitung zur Verfügung stehen. Hier ein paar Hinweise, damit du dich rundum wohlfühlst: Trage bequeme Kleidung, in der du dich gut bewegen kannst. Iss lieber nur eine leichte Mahlzeit vorher. Verzichte auf starkes Parfüm, damit wir alle frei atmen können. Alkohol am besten vor der Session meiden. Wenn du dich nicht fit fühlst, gönn dir bitte Ruhe zu Hause. https://danhart.co/reset/

title: HATHA YOGA WITH MANTRAS
description: Immerse yourself in the practice of Traditional Hatha Yoga. Through the asanas (postures), pranayama (breathwork) and relaxation accompanied by live mantras, we will explore the connection between body and mind. TUESDAYS 6:45-8:00pm. RADIANT HEART STUDIO PRICE: A) Regular price: 1 class (75 min.) CHF 28.- B) Let's make yoga an Inclusive practice! Donation based classes. HATHA YOGA The term "hatha" combines the Sanskrit roots "ha" (sun) and "tha" (moon), symbolizing the twin energy forces,which exist in everything and are balanced through the practice of Hatha Yoga. A typical Hatha Yoga class involves slower-paced movements, with an emphasis on holding asanas (postures) for extended periods and integrating controlled breathing. This practice is suitable for those seeking a mindful, holistic, grounding yoga experience and wanting to achieve mental clarity, a healthy body, and a sense of peace. MANTRA Mantra is a sound, and sound is an aspect of energy, a powerful energy which can influence the mind. A mantra is a powerful sound vibration, rooted in the Sanskrit words for "repetition" and "freedom," that influences the mind and consciousness. Mantras help practitioners concentrate, calm emotions, purify impressions, and invite positive energy by affecting the deeper layers of the mind and consciousness.

title: Awakening Kundalini | Breathwork Masterclass • Nyon
description: Are you ready to discover how breathing can unlock your ultimate well-being and highest potential? Join Sylvie Horvath of Soul Dimension for a transformative 90-minute Breathwork meditation journey designed to awaken what Yogis call Kundalini - the super potent, intelligent life force energy within. During this class, you'll be guided on an expansive journey of self-discovery and transformation. You'll experience how Soul Dimension breathing and simple ancient yogic practices can activate your body’s natural healing energy, deep reservoirs of vitality, clarity, bliss states, and expanded consciousness. When the Kundalini energy awakens, it stimulates your body’s natural healing mechanisms, promoting physical, mental, emotional, and spiritual well-being. This energy also unlocks greater creative flows, removes stuck and stagnant energy, promotes equilibrium, and awakens your deeper potential in all areas of life. What is Kundalini Energy? Kundalini energy is often described as a latent life force that resides at the base of the spine, symbolized as a coiled serpent. In scientific terms, it’s closely associated with the nervous system and bioenergy—the energy that flows through our bodies and sustains life. When this energy is activated through practices like breathwork, meditation, or yoga, it is directed up the spine through chakras (energy centers), enhancing physical, emotional, and spiritual health. Kundalini awakening happens when this powerful, dormant energy begins to rise up through the spine, passing through the chakras, activating, balancing, and purifying them. This process leads to a profound holistic transformation that affects every dimension of a person's being - physical, mental, emotional, and spiritual. Yogis believe that when kundalini awakens, one's true life begins. Who is This Class For? Perfect for both beginners and experienced practitioners, this session is designed to support a safe, nurturing, and expansive experience on your journey of self-discovery, healing, and awakening to your highest potential. Benefits of Awakening Kundalini Spiritual Awakening: Many masters of Kundalini yoga describe Kundalini awakening as a profound journey toward enlightenment, offering deeper insights into the nature of existence and the self. Expanded Consciousness: Spiritual teachers emphasize that Kundalini's awakening broadens awareness, connecting individuals to higher states of consciousness and universal wisdom. Union with the Divine: According to Kundalini masters, this energy leads to a sense of oneness with the divine, promoting a sacred connection with the cosmos or universal life force. Heightened Intuition: Awakening Kundalini is said to sharpen intuition, allowing individuals to access deeper levels of inner guidance and spiritual perception. Cleansing of Karma: Spiritual teachings highlight that Kundalini purifies karmic imprints, helping to clear past life blockages and accelerate spiritual evolution. Balancing Chakras: Kundalini energy is believed to harmonize and activate the chakras, aligning the body's energetic centers and promoting overall balance. Inner Wisdom and Knowledge: Many masters teach that Kundalini activates dormant wisdom within, helping one access ancient knowledge and spiritual truths. Inner Joy and Bliss: Once awakened, Kundalini often brings a state of bliss or Ananda, described by teachers as an innate, unshakeable joy that transcends external circumstances. Deep Healing: Spiritual guides often note that Kundalini energy supports profound emotional, mental, and physical healing, as it clears blockages and aligns one’s energy with higher vibrations. Divine Transformation: Masters describe Kundalini as a catalyst for deep transformation, helping individuals evolve into their highest self and live a life of purpose, service, and divine connection. Symptoms of Kundalini Energy Awakening? Sudden Surges of Energy: Feeling waves of heat or tingling sensations moving up the spine or throughout the body. Heightened Awareness: Becoming more attuned to subtle energies, sounds, and sensations around you. Spontaneous Emotional Release: Experiencing sudden bursts of emotion, such as crying or laughter, is often related to emotional healing. Increased Creativity: A surge of creative ideas, artistic inspiration, or desire to create. Changes in Sleep Patterns: Difficulty sleeping or needing less sleep as the body adjusts to new energy levels. Vivid Dreams or Visions: Having intense, symbolic dreams or even visions during meditation. Physical Sensations: Feeling pressure or sensations in the head (often at the crown), base of the spine, or along the spinal column. Intense Focus or Mental Clarity: A deepening sense of clarity and concentration, allowing you to focus on complex ideas or spiritual insights. Heightened Intuition: A stronger inner voice, clearer gut feelings, or enhanced psychic abilities. Temporary Physical Discomfort: Some experience tension, muscle spasms, or other temporary discomforts as the body adjusts to the energy shift. Changes in Appetite or Diet: Sudden shifts in food preferences, often leaning towards lighter, cleaner foods as energy realigns. These symptoms can vary in intensity and duration, depending on the person and how prepared their body and mind are for the awakening process. Though powerful, Kundalini's awakening is most beneficial when approached with patience and a focus on grounding the energy for balance and integration. title: Awakening Kundalini | Breathwork Masterclass • St. Gallen
description: Are you ready to discover how breathing can unlock your ultimate well-being and highest potential? Join Sylvie Horvath of Soul Dimension for a transformative 90-minute Breathwork meditation journey designed to awaken what Yogis call Kundalini - the super potent, intelligent life force energy within. During this class, you'll be guided on an expansive journey of self-discovery and transformation. You'll experience how Soul Dimension breathing and simple ancient yogic practices can activate your body’s natural healing energy, deep reservoirs of vitality, clarity, bliss states, and expanded consciousness. When the Kundalini energy awakens, it stimulates your body’s natural healing mechanisms, promoting physical, mental, emotional, and spiritual well-being. This energy also unlocks greater creative flows, removes stuck and stagnant energy, promotes equilibrium, and awakens your deeper potential in all areas of life. What is Kundalini Energy? Kundalini energy is often described as a latent life force that resides at the base of the spine, symbolized as a coiled serpent. In scientific terms, it’s closely associated with the nervous system and bioenergy—the energy that flows through our bodies and sustains life. When this energy is activated through practices like breathwork, meditation, or yoga, it is directed up the spine through chakras (energy centers), enhancing physical, emotional, and spiritual health. Kundalini awakening happens when this powerful, dormant energy begins to rise up through the spine, passing through the chakras, activating, balancing, and purifying them. This process leads to a profound holistic transformation that affects every dimension of a person's being - physical, mental, emotional, and spiritual. Yogis believe that when kundalini awakens, one's true life begins. Who is This Class For? Perfect for both beginners and experienced practitioners, this session is designed to support a safe, nurturing, and expansive experience on your journey of self-discovery, healing, and awakening to your highest potential. Benefits of Awakening Kundalini Spiritual Awakening: Many masters of Kundalini yoga describe Kundalini awakening as a profound journey toward enlightenment, offering deeper insights into the nature of existence and the self. Expanded Consciousness: Spiritual teachers emphasize that Kundalini's awakening broadens awareness, connecting individuals to higher states of consciousness and universal wisdom. Union with the Divine: According to Kundalini masters, this energy leads to a sense of oneness with the divine, promoting a sacred connection with the cosmos or universal life force. Heightened Intuition: Awakening Kundalini is said to sharpen intuition, allowing individuals to access deeper levels of inner guidance and spiritual perception. Cleansing of Karma: Spiritual teachings highlight that Kundalini purifies karmic imprints, helping to clear past life blockages and accelerate spiritual evolution. Balancing Chakras: Kundalini energy is believed to harmonize and activate the chakras, aligning the body's energetic centers and promoting overall balance. Inner Wisdom and Knowledge: Many masters teach that Kundalini activates dormant wisdom within, helping one access ancient knowledge and spiritual truths. Inner Joy and Bliss: Once awakened, Kundalini often brings a state of bliss or Ananda, described by teachers as an innate, unshakeable joy that transcends external circumstances. Deep Healing: Spiritual guides often note that Kundalini energy supports profound emotional, mental, and physical healing, as it clears blockages and aligns one’s energy with higher vibrations. Divine Transformation: Masters describe Kundalini as a catalyst for deep transformation, helping individuals evolve into their highest self and live a life of purpose, service, and divine connection. Symptoms of Kundalini Energy Awakening? Sudden Surges of Energy: Feeling waves of heat or tingling sensations moving up the spine or throughout the body. Heightened Awareness: Becoming more attuned to subtle energies, sounds, and sensations around you. Spontaneous Emotional Release: Experiencing sudden bursts of emotion, such as crying or laughter, is often related to emotional healing. Increased Creativity: A surge of creative ideas, artistic inspiration, or desire to create. Changes in Sleep Patterns: Difficulty sleeping or needing less sleep as the body adjusts to new energy levels. Vivid Dreams or Visions: Having intense, symbolic dreams or even visions during meditation. Physical Sensations: Feeling pressure or sensations in the head (often at the crown), base of the spine, or along the spinal column. Intense Focus or Mental Clarity: A deepening sense of clarity and concentration, allowing you to focus on complex ideas or spiritual insights. Heightened Intuition: A stronger inner voice, clearer gut feelings, or enhanced psychic abilities. Temporary Physical Discomfort: Some experience tension, muscle spasms, or other temporary discomforts as the body adjusts to the energy shift. Changes in Appetite or Diet: Sudden shifts in food preferences, often leaning towards lighter, cleaner foods as energy realigns. These symptoms can vary in intensity and duration, depending on the person and how prepared their body and mind are for the awakening process. Though powerful, Kundalini's awakening is most beneficial when approached with patience and a focus on grounding the energy for balance and integration. Dive into Healing Sessions, Masterclasses, Breathing Experiences, and Live Breathing Classes immediately. Learn more. Members and ticket holders: Log into the “my account” page to access the class. Class Schedule Our classes are scheduled as follows: 10 AM US Pacific Time (Los Angeles) 12 PM Central Time (Chicago) 1 PM Eastern Time (New York) 6 PM GMT (London) 7 PM CET (Berlin) Conditions The event is conducted online using the Zoom Meetings application, so be sure to have a reliable internet connection. Our tickets are available for purchase up to 5 days in advance of the event, guaranteeing that you always have a minimum of 2 days of access to the event replay. This new process is designed to enhance your Soul Dimension experience, helping you to increase your well-being and spiritual growth. You will receive the Zoom Link of the event in the order confirmation email just after the purchase. All classes are taught in English. Cancellation and refund policy There are no refunds for the ticket. If you are not able to join live, no worries! The replay will be available 24 hours after the end of the class and you will be able to access it until the end of your access period. By buying the ticket you will have access to our content (ticket and bonuses) for 7 days and the access period starts on the day of your purchase.

title: Schamanisches Gebärmutterritual mit dem Ei
description: Wusstest du, dass auch Männer die Gebärmutter heilen können? Weil du von einer Frau abstammst, deiner Mutter. Dies ist eine der tiefsten Arten der Heilung und wird auf einer so tiefen schamanischen Ebene des lebenswichtigsten Organs durchgeführt. Möchtest du noch tiefer in deine eigene Kraft eintauchen, um dein Kraftzentrum, deine Gebärmutter, zu ehren und zu heilen und diese Kraft aus deinem Inneren heraus freizusetzen? Diese geballte Energie nicht nur spüren, sondern auch schöpfen? Heile deine eigene Weiblichkeit und trenne dich von allem, was deinen Mutterleib noch energetisch belastet. Wir arbeiten mit dem Ei, dafür bitte ich dich 3 frische Eier von sehr glücklichen Hühner mitzubringen.

title: Cardiology Conference | Interventional Cardiology Conference | Zurich
description: We are pleased to announce the 11th International Conference on Interventional Cardiology , scheduled to take place on October 24-25, 2024 , in the picturesque city of Zurich, Switzerland . This conference will serve as a premier platform for leading cardiologists , cardiovascular surgeons, researchers, and industry professionals to gather and exchange knowledge on the latest advancements in cardiovascular interventions. The theme for Interventional Cardiology 2024 conference is " Advancements in Cardiovascular Interventions: Diagnosis to Regeneration." We aim to delve into the spectrum of innovative techniques, technologies, and strategies that span the entire continuum of cardiovascular care, from early diagnosis to the exciting frontier of regenerative therapies. Join us in Zurich for an enriching and transformative experience at the forefront of cardiovascular interventions. Together, let's explore new horizons in cardiovascular care and pave the way towards improved patient outcomes and enhanced quality of life. We look forward to welcoming you to the 11th International Conference on Interventional Cardiology

title: 5th World Congress on Pediatrics and Neonatology
Introduction to learning Transcendental Meditation
description: Transcendental Meditation (TM) is easy. Anyone can learn the technique in a few sessions. It is completely effortless and enjoyable to practice, and the effects are usually noticeable from the first few sittings. During the last 40 years, hundreds of published research studies on Transcendental Meditation have documented its effectiveness in reducing stress and anxiety, brain functioning, cardiovasular heath, and more. Do you have 60 minutes to discover what TM can do for you ? The first step is to attend a free info session.This will be presented by a certified teacher of Transcendental Meditation. You will find out: Why TM is so effective for stress and anxiety Why anyone can practise TM What benefits you can realistically expect How it works – the process of transcending How TM differs from other meditations What happens during TM Following the talk there will be an opportunity to meet privately with the teacher to discuss personal considerations. The talk is a prerequisite to joining one of the monthly scheduled courses of instruction in TM, but there is no commitment to learn. It is open to everyone even if you only have a mild curiosity! Feel free to bring a friend. Feel free to contact Philippe for any further questions you may have : phmercanton@mt-geneve.ch / 022 733 31 42 - 078 654 81 07. Looking forward seeing you on one of these occasions! Philippe Mercanton , certified TM-Teacher Route : tram 14,18; bus 3, 11 (bus stand : Servette)

Luxury Lugano International High Jewelry Exhibition
description: Luxury Lugano High Jewelry International Exhibition is back on 22, 23, 24 November at the iconic LAC Lugano Arte e Cultura . This extraordinary event promises a captivating experience, featuring exclusive collections and designs by 30 international brands and designers coming from all around the world . All the exhibitors are selected by a team of experts, and showcase high jewelry as never seen before. The inauguration, scheduled for Friday, November 22 , promises to be a memorable event. The evening will begin at 4:00 PM with the Ribbon Cutting Ceremony attended by the Honorable Deputy Mayor Badaracco , and the Press Preview . Following this, from 6:00 PM to 10:00 PM , the Opening Cocktail Gala inspired by "The Great Gatsby" will take place, an exclusive event by invitation only. On Saturday, November 23 , the exhibition will be open to the public from 4:00 PM to 7:00 PM , with free entry. From 7:00 PM to 10:00 PM , guests can participate in an exclusive Cocktail Party with a DJ set and live performances, free with prior registration and limited availability. On Sunday, November 24 , the exhibition will reopen to the public from 4:00 PM to 8:00 PM , with free entry. At 6:00 PM , don’t miss the chance to attend a spectacular Fashion Show by Jenny Monteiro , showcasing her Haute Couture creations paired with the precious jewelry from the brands on display. The event will be accompanied by a refined light aperitif and will be accessible upon registration, with limited seating. Join us at Luxury Lugano and immerse yourself in a celebration where elegance meets glamour and art meets culture. PROGRAM Friday, November 22 4:00 PM - 6:00 PM Ribbon Cutting Ceremony with Deputy Mayor Badaracco and Press Preview 6:00 PM – 10:00 PM Cocktail Gala inspired by "The Great Gatsby" – exclusive event by invitation only Saturday, November 23 4:00 PM – 7:00 PM Exhibition open to the public – free entry 7:00 PM – 10:00 PM Cocktail Party with DJ Set and live performances – free entry with registration, limited availability Sunday, November 24 4:00 PM – 8:00 PM Exhibition open to the public – free entry 6:00 PM Fashion Show and jewelry presentation in collaboration with Jenny Monteiro, light aperitif – upon registration, limited availability For info, free registration, and tickets, click here .

title: "Potentiels" L'Exposition de Kelvin Ansong à la Galerie Les Arts du Soleil Genève
description: "Potentiels" L'Exposition de Kelvin Ansong à la Galerie Les Arts du Soleil Genève La Galerie Les Arts du Soleil Genève a le plaisir de vous convier à découvrir l’exposition “Potentiels” de l’artiste ghanéen Kelvin Ansong. À travers une série de paysages, l’artiste vous invite à prendre conscience du potentiel inexploité qui sommeille en vous ainsi que de l’énergie intérieure nécessaire pour servir une cause ou initier un changement.

title: Авторская лекция "Рене Магритт. За гранью реальности" на русском языке
description: Авторская лекция "Рене Магритт. За гранью реальности" на русском языке 🙋‍♀️ Меня зовут Любовь и я искусствовед, арт-менеджер, лектор и в прошлом гид по Санкт-Петербургу. Сотрудничала с галереей Secci в Милане и представляла галерею на ярмарке UNTITLED в Майами. Я буду в Лугано всего пару дней и хочу провести для вас свою лучшую лекцию:) Лекция прошла с успехом во многих городах: Санкт-Петербург, Москва, Стамбул, Милан и теперь Лугано. Я рассказываю об искусстве просто, легко и доступно, собирая на своих мероприятиях самых душевных людей. Моя лекция стала настоящим бестселлером, о чем свидетельствуют многочисленные положительные отзывы Каждый сюжет Магритта - это интеллектуальная игра, ребус, который предстоит разгадать слушателю лекции. Его работы полны загадок и неожиданностей, и каждая картина заставляет задуматься о том, как мы воспринимаем эту реальность. Вас ждет увлекательное путешествие в мир сюрреализма!

title: Comedy on the Rocks: English Open Mic
location: Lausanne Cocktail Club - LCC, Rue Pépinet, Lausanne, Switzerland
description: 'Comedy on the Rocks' English Open Mic is BACK! Every show brings comedians from around Switzerland (and Geneva) to LCC for a night of laughs. Come with your friends, colleagues or other people who you like to spend time with, but don't want to talk to. New and experienced comedians test out new jokes for the first time and keep tweaking and working out their other material as they work towards......something. A netflix special? Probably not, but maybe some viral YouTube or TikTok clips? Maybe! It's donation based, so come and drink liberally and give generously so we can keep bringing the HaHa's to Switzerland, the most HILARIOUS Direct Democracy/Confederation on the Planet! title: Evolution & Schöpfung – Eine Frage der Perspektive?
description: Evolution & Schöpfung – Eine Frage der Perspektive? Date: Do  31. Oktober 2024 Zeit: 19:00 Ort: UniS Kommen Sie zu einer faszinierenden Veranstaltung, bei der die Themen Evolution und Schöpfung aus verschiedenen Blickwinkeln beleuchtet werden. Ganz gleich, ob Sie sich für Naturwissenschaften oder für philosophische Diskussionen interessieren, dieser Diskussionsabend wird mit Sicherheit zu anregenden Gesprächen führen. Kommen Sie rechtzeitig, damit Sie noch einen guten Platz erwischen! Im nunmehr sechsten Vortrag der Reihe « Mehr als Sternenstaub?» geht es um die grundlegende Frage, ob die Vorstellung einer Schöpfung der Welt und die wissenschaftliche Evolutionstheorie im Widerspruch zueinanderstehen müssen. Kann man die beiden Perspektiven auch zusammen sehen? Wenn ja, wie? Oder was steht dem im Wege? Dazu diskutieren Vertreter der Biologie und der Theologie der Universität Bern. Schon im Vortrag von John Hedley Brooke vor rund einem Jahr kam diese Frage auf, als es um Charles Darwins Religionsverständnis ging. Der Vater der Evolutionstheorie, der zu Beginn seiner Karriere anglikanische Theologie studiert hatte, im Verlaufe seines Lebens sich aber vom Christentum distanziere, hielt die Idee eines Schöpfers für möglich. Während die letzten 6 Veranstaltungen hauptsächlich aus Vorträgen bestanden haben (gefolgt von einer moderierten Diskussion und einem Teil, in dem das Publikum Fragen stellen konnten), besteht die kommende Veranstaltung aus einer Diskussionsrunde mit Vertretern der Naturwissenschaften und der Theologie: Claudia Bank ist Professorin am Institut für Ökologie und Evolution der Universität Bern Sebastian Leidel ist Professor am Departement für Chemie, Biochemie und Pharmazeutische Wissenschaften der Universität Bern. Ursprünglich hatte er auch Theologie studiert- Andreas Losch , Theologe der Schweizerischen Bibelgesellschaft, hat sich auf das Gespräch mit den Naturwissenschaften spezialisiert. Er ist Privatdozent an der Uni Zürich und forscht zur «Ethik der Planetaren Nachhaltigkeit» an der Universität Bern. Moderiert wird der Abend von der reformierten Theologin Judith Wipfler , die seit 2000 als Fachredaktorin für Religion bei SRF arbeitet.

title: Too Traumatic Comedy with Teddy Hall
description: The only thing more important than family is going to therapy because of your family. At this comedy show a line up of fantastic comedians, local and international, will share stories and home truths about everything and anything real and honest. Come out for English comedy that is soul-bearing, from the heart, and- most importantly- hilariously funny. This show will feature Teddy Hall (@teddyhallcomedy), an exciting European touring comedian and will have support from some of the best European comedy talent. Teddy Hall Since learning his trade as a comedian in London in 2016, Teddy has been performing across Europe for years, exciting audiences with an unpredictable and quick-witted brand of comedy all about language, mental health, sexuality, and dentists. In his base of Basel, Switzerland, he has founded and runs On The Run Comedy Club, an independent European comedy touring comedy and co-produces and hosts Comic Strip, a variety show renowned for its beautiful chaos. Headlining shows across Europe and featuring on television in Switzerland, Germany, Austria, and Romania, Teddy's comedy veers from the profound to the inane to the stupid, keeping audiences on their toes, despite this being a very uncomfortable way to sit. Teddy was nominated for a Swiss Comedy Award (and lost) and has also featured on Comedy Central DE Roast Battle. Furthermore, Teddy is going to film a taping for LMAOF, the OnlyFans comedy channel. Teddy has opened for Todd Barry, Victor Patrascan, Dragos, Ashley Gavin, Robby Slowik, Casey Balsham, TJ, Daniel Ryan Spaulding, Anna Beros, Emma Dalenberg, Gauri B and many more. The show takes place at the heart of great comedy in Geneva, the iconic Floky La Loutre. 19.30 Doors, 20.00 Showtime Get your tickets in advance online to save some cash. Ticket prices are as follows: 18CHF LIMITED Early Bird tickets 20CHF Student Ticket 25CHF Advance Tickets 30CHF On The Door, cash or TWINT A production from On The Run Comedy Club. If money is the reason you are unable to attend the show, feel free to email teddyhallcomedy@gmail.com to be guestlisted. Money shouldn't be the restriction to art.

Concert de SwissPulse à Ecublens
description: Vivez la Magie de Pink Floyd avec Swiss Pulse Plongez dans un voyage sonore qui transcende le temps et l’espace avec Swiss Pulse, le premier groupe hommage à Pink Floyd en Suisse. Dédié à recréer fidèlement le son et l’atmosphère légendaires de Pink Floyd, Swiss Pulse offre une expérience musicale authentique qui résonne auprès des fans de longue date comme des nouveaux venus. Des mélodies envoûtantes de “Wish You Were Here” aux paysages sonores épiques de “Shine On You Crazy Diamond”, nos performances sont un hommage sincère à la musique qui a défini une génération. Avec une attention méticuleuse aux détails, des visuels de pointe et une passion pour l’excellence, Swiss Pulse donne vie à l’essence de Pink Floyd sur scène. Rejoignez-nous pour une soirée inoubliable de classiques intemporels et de morceaux rares qui capturent l’esprit de l’un des groupes les plus influents de l’histoire du rock. Que vous soyez un fan de la première heure ou que vous découvriez Pink Floyd pour la première fois, Swiss Pulse promet un spectacle qui vous laissera émerveillé. Visitez notre site web à l’adresse swisspulse.band pour connaître les prochaines dates de tournée, les informations sur les billets et du contenu exclusif. Connectez-vous avec nous sur les réseaux sociaux et faites partie de la communauté Swiss Pulse alors que nous célébrons l’héritage durable de Pink Floyd.

title: Improv Drop-In with the Renegade Saints - 24 November
description: Join us at Mr. Pickwick's on Sunday morning for some fun improv! All levels of experience are welcome. We’ll play a variety of comedic improv games and exercises, guaranteed to make you crack a smile. We usually stick around for a bit of brunch after. If you've watched 'Whose Line Is It Anyway' or seen the Renegade Saints perform and thought that looks like fun, here's your chance to join in. It's barmy, it's silly and you're bound to love it. These sessions are good for anyone, whether you're looking to laugh off the stress of the workweek, get a little more self-confidence, or work on some performing skills towards that acting career you've always wanted. Places are limited so sign up quick! See you there! (The sessions take place downstairs, in the Lounge Bar of Pickwick's - straight ahead at the bottom of the stairs.) NB: Pickwick's only opens at 11am, so don't arrive too early and be patient if it takes them a minute to open the doors. ;)

title: Fabulous Quiz Halloween Party!
description: * Discounts for newcomers and large groups ! * This quiz's theme will be Halloween, ooh spooky! Welcome to my Fabulous Quiz Dinner! I'm very proud of this event, there's nothing like it! It's a mix of quiz, cocktail night, speed dating, stand-up comedy and karaoke and it's different every time! I can't guarantee you correct answers or a knowledgeable host, but I can guarantee you that you will make new friends and have a fabulous time! Guaranteed But Max, it's at dinner time, won't I get hungry? That's ok, because there's a 3 course dinner of starter, main and tiramisu + glass of prosecco for only 49 CHF! (45 CHF for debutants and groups of 6 or more). All this and my fashion advice for free, who can resist? But Max, I actually care about the trivia, I want to look smart to my friends/date/parents, what will the quiz be about? Well each quiz is unique and curated by me, but I can tell you that this Quiz's main theme will be - Halloweeen! (other scary topics too) So grab your favourite halloween costume  and bring your fabulous self and your fantastic friends to my Fabulous Quiz Party! It's a unique show, a mix of glamour, comedy, trivia and above all, human interaction! So put down your phone, stop swiping on fake profiles and come and meet real people! But Max, why should I answer the questions? Heyyy, you don't have to, just get your teammates to do it while you eat your pasta and make friends. Or help your team and maybe you can win the grand prize, a bottle of champagne! There are also many bonus prizes! Ok Max , when should I come, can I come alone? Coming alone can be scary but it's totally fine, I do it all the time ;-) but if you want some partners I can help you find them. The best way is to come early so I can meet you personally and help introduce you to all the fabulous people, connecting people is my special skill! Timeline reserve your ticket(s), now! :-) Come to Perbacco restaurant on Friday November 1st From 7:00-7:30pm there is a mingling phase, I will get to know each and everyone of you and help you settle in, meet new people and form teams 7:30pm the quiz starts and anything can happen! 7:30-10pm You enjoy a delicious italian meal with friends and laughs from your comedic host who will be complaining that his feet hurt You stay for the after party as the winner's drink champagne! Ok Max, sounds great, how do I book? You mean you haven't already? Ok just click on the 'Reserve a Spot' a button and scare you on Friday 1st Nov!

title: Girls In Stand Up - Open Mic - 23 Octobre
Award Ceremony : International Contest for Minority Artists 2024
location: Centre des arts - Ecole Internationale de Genève
description: [L'événement aura lieu en anglais, avec traduction simultanée en français disponible] The International Art Contest for Minority Artists is organized since 2022 by the Office of the United Nations High Commissioner for Human Rights (OHCHR) and its partners, the NGOs Freemuse and Minority Rights Group International (MRG), and the City of Geneva. The Contest serves as a platform for minority artists human rights defenders , who work on a variety of themes relating to minority rights and human rights. Organized with the support of the Centre des Arts of the International School of Geneva, the third edition of the Contest focuses on the theme of Minorities and Memory in the Present . During the Award Ceremony of 26 November, the laureates of the Third Edition of the Contest will be celebrated. Coming from different countries and contexts, the artists honored at this Ceremony are all distinguished by their artistic commitment, and their deeply personal interpretation of both intimate and collective experiences as members of national, linguistic, religious or ethnic minorities. In countries where minorities have been confronted with a history of human rights violations, the artistic and creative work of memorialization is crucial to advancing reparation, reconciliation and transitional justice. The artists honored at this Ceremony all shed light, each in their own way, on how the recognition of the past and memory are inexorably linked to the realization of human rights in the present and the future. Agenda : 19h00-20h00: Ceremony - presentation of Awards and Honorable Mentions to the laureates of the 2024 edition of the Contest 20h00-21h00: Cocktail reception The Ceremony will be held in English, with simultaneous translation into French available . Please arrive at the Ceremony by 18:30-18:45. The "Art, Minorities and Human Rights" exhibition will also be installed at the Centre des Arts of the International School of Geneva, and participants will be able to visit.

title: Knitting Party mit Monica bei Malso Lokal, Bern
description: Liebe Strickbegeisterte, wir laden Sie herzlich zu unserer WAK Strick-Party für Anfänger ein! Tauchen Sie ein in die wunderbare Welt des Strickens und entdecken Sie ein neues Hobby, bei dem Sie Ihre Kreativität entfalten können. Datum: Samstag, 07.12.24 Uhrzeit: 15:00 bis 17:00 Ort: Malso Lokal, Bogenschützenstrasse 9a, (Postparc Bern Bahnhof), 3008 Bern WAK bietet hochwertige Wolle an, mit der Sie Ihre Projekte zum Leben erwecken können. Ob Sie bereits Erfahrung haben oder ganz neu in der Welt des Strickens sind, bei uns sind alle herzlich willkommen. Der Stricktreff wird hauptsächlich auf Spanisch durchgeführt, aber keine Sorge, Deutsch kann ebenfalls gesprochen werden. Es ist eine großartige Gelegenheit, Ihre Sprachkenntnisse zu verbessern und neue Freundschaften zu knüpfen. Hier sind die 3 Kits, die (für alle Level) für diese Veranstaltung angeboten werden: Nick Blanket X @Morganemathieu Himba Snood Little Dipper Snood Freuen Sie sich auf einen gemütlichen Austausch, bei dem wir uns über DIY-Projekte und selbstgemachte Weihnachtsgeschenke austauschen können. Wir können es kaum erwarten, Sie zu sehen! Sie haben bis zum 27. November 2024 Zeit, sich anzumelden, indem Sie Ihr Lieblingskit auswählen! (Bitte teilen Sie uns Ihre Farbauswahl per E-Mail mit, basierend auf der Verfügbarkeit.) Wir freuen uns darauf, Sie am 07.12 im Café Malso (Konsumationspflicht) zu begrüßen. Bringen Sie Ihre Stricknadeln und das X-Mas Feeling mit!
